text: David Jalbert is a pianist and professor at the University of Ottawa. In 2018, Jalbert was nominated for a Juno award in the category Classical Album of the Year for his album Stravinsky & Prokofiev: Transcriptions pour piano."Arcade Fire and Daniel Caesar lead 2018 Juno Award nominations". CBC Music, February 6, 2018. ==References== ==External links== *Official website Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Canadian classical pianists Category:Male classical pianists Category:21st-century classical pianists Category:21st-century male musicians
title: David Jalbert (pianist)
